column3: “It's pretty, my hubby and I also call it redhead reefer" because of the thick red hairs it has.  Lots of keef to be collected
column4: if you have a grinder with a keef collector.  Smells great

column3: “Focused and alert high. Great day time med for anxiety/depression. Strong fruity taste, my be considered sweet by some users. Small dabs of this throughout the day is how I keep medicated. Highly recommended!!”

“This is one of my favorites. If grown correctly it is a nice even high with a smooth finish. The flavor is phenomenal especially if you enjoy a fruity finish. I've done plenty of housework after a couple of hits of this strain. I've mostly smoked this strain that I grew but have tried it at dispensaries a couple of times. If you just want to have fun try Heavy Duty Fruity.”

“Heavy duty fruity is a stain that yields incredible high.  May very well be one of the highest yielding.  I didn't rate this strain as medicinal because of the lack of effect other that anxiety.  One 2 gram joint smoked halfway produced a buzzy spacey high that was somewhat pleasurable, but more psychedelic than I would have liked.  Probably would be good for someone suffering from a mental disorder, but no good for ...”
“This stuff is sticky. I got a lot of energy with this, definitely a day time use. Felt like doing things all day. Guys this good for when your girl wants to go shopping.”

“This strain is the best. You become very focused and relaxed at the same time. And most of all, my favorite part on this strain is that it gives you the LSD feeling. You smoke it and you get high and you’d feel like you’re on some acid euphoria. Also it’s best to have sex on this and to listen to chill mixes with beats and bass and a lot of instruments. It’s like giving you a super power of hearing cause you’ll hear ...”
“I have tried" HDF more than a million times
“Nice taste good yield. Effects are gone in about an hour. Good smoke before you go into movies medicine you will be comfortable and might even remember the end the movie enjoy.”
“Wow!!! Just WOW!!! Mindblowing psychic storm, lightly psychedelic, but with super heavy indica influenced body effects. Don't plan an evening out while enjoying this one. I love it!!!”

“This bud did not have a strong smell to it. The high was quite powerful in the way it made me feel introverted and allowed my mind to wander to many profound thoughts. As the name would imply this strain tasted fruity but also slightly spicy. Very little negative effects, a little dry mouth and thats it.”
“HeavyDutyFruity has always been my favorite strain.  It has an excellent smell that says I can't wait to be vaporized"
column4: sweet fruity flavor and the best overall high I have come across in 40 years.”"

column3: “HDF is 50% Sativa 50% Indica. The heritage is Killin Garberville x Mendocino Hash Plant x Seattle Big Bud."

column2: I could definitely notice the "muscle soothing" capabilities of the strain. Left me with a nice euphoria quickly but could bring anxiety and/or laziness if used too much.”"

column3: “seriously the f-ing best smoke I've ever had.... helps my insomnia and makes me super creative !”

“Smells really good.  It's a sweet smell, not fruity like fruit punch, but more like oranges.  

When you grind it for vaping it definitely intensifies the aroma. 

Buds are pale green with tons of red and orange hairs and some decent crystallization.

I tool three pulls from my pax and a nice smooth happy buzz slowly creeped in.  It was a enjoyable high not overwhelming just euphoric and happy.  

No anxiety no paran...”

“OK, so here's the thing.  I got this strain in concentrate suppositories from a dispensary down in Albany, Oregon. I'm a medical patient up in Portland, Oregon. I was pretty put off at first of stick weed up my ass but the owner of the dispensary swears by them so I said what the hell I'll try anything once.  It was for my pain maintenance and I got GDP suppositories for my insomnia.  So,  I got home and..  Well,  I ...”
“Great Stuff all Around.  Got An 8th From Cross Genetics abd It Was Definitely Worth it.”

“OK, so here's the thing.  I got this strain in concentrate suppositories from a dispensary down in Albany, Oregon. I'm a medical patient up in Portland, Oregon. I was pretty put off at first of stick weed up my ass but the owner of the dispensary swears by them so I said what the hell I'll try anything once.  It was for my pain maintenance and I got GDP suppositories for my insomnia.  So,  I got home and..  Well,  I ...”

column2: I could definitely notice the "muscle soothing" capabilities of the strain. Left me with a nice euphoria quickly but could bring anxiety and/or laziness if used too much.”"

column3:
“Super dooper chill 
High - very uneventful, you're so high you just sit there n melt”

“What a Great strain! The first time I tried Heavy Duty Fruity, I was watching YouTube on my phone. All of a sudden I noticed my eyes going almost completely shut. Lol Heavy Duty Fruity is the strongest Hybrid strain I've had. Do yourself a favor and get this strain right away if it's in your area. Definitely worth it!!!”
“this stuff gave me an existential crisis. 4/5 would maybe smoke again.”

“Heavy Duty Fruity, did not really do it for me. The batch I had barley got me going, but i did feel a strange light body high. I ended up saving it for a night cap, before bed. Never picked it up again. it might be good, the grower who grew it, might have messed it up. Tasted good, but I need some KA-Pow too.”

“I got this strain on the suggestion of the lady at the dispensary.  I was looking for Afgoo, because it really helps with my insomnia.   Not only did this help me with my insomnia, but it also help with stress and anxiety.  The only thing is that this strain, for me, goes straight into the next day as far as sleep.  I was still a little sleepy at around 2:30pm the next day.  This strain has a name that really suits i...”
“great day flower. the price you can't beat and the flavor is amazing.”
“This heavy duty fruity will leave you feeling happy and focused. its super sweet and potent.”

“Perfectly Balanced Hybrid! Feels like a heavy indica with no real couch lock or lack of motivation because it also feels like a nice sativa. Best of both worlds. Mellows my anxiety down after a few minutes, works great for stress or irritation and puts me to sleep beautifully. Mine has a musky citrus smell to it. Taste is wonderful. Overall one of my all time favorite strains.”
“Pretty stringy buds with curly fan leaves, not particularly great.”
“This was a wonderfully tasting smoke with a happy and relaxed high. A few hits from the bong and I found my zen. Highly recommend.”
“best tasting stuff ive ever had, like fruity pebbles. High is decent and well balanced. Smells great and highly recommended.”
“I Freaking love this strain.”

“My friend from DC grew this strain to a beautiful more indica looking pheno. The look/taste is 10/10 but effects are what i care about most and i must say it felt like a mild indica with no couch lock effects and a mild sativa with no real strong cerebral effect so i feal by being a hybrid this strain gives you a little of each which is good but it doesnt deliver those effects as strong as i thought it would have. I ...”
“This is a nice strain. It indeed calls out your creative side, and your hunger side! It tastes like Fruity Pebbles. I wish it had couch lock though and less cotton mouth. Overall a good smoke.”
“One of my favorite strains to grow. Has a very sweet smell with tight buds and high THC content. Highly recommend!”
“Heavy is right. It has knocked me out on the couch many nights. Super relaxing.”
“Smells amazing, made me feel even better! If you buy this, get a lot!”
“very fruity tasting and smells fruity inside VERY dense and strong indica aswell. but i will say it makes your eyes itch”

“This was my first time growing this strain and I'm glad I did. This plant is a monster. Outdoors I cropped over 4 dry oz per plant. What's so impressive is the way this stuff smells and tastes. It has a unique taste, very fruity and sweet. I love a few rips before work to start the day right. This plant will now be a fixture in my garden.”
“best tasting stuff ive ever had, like fruity pebbles. High is decent and well balanced. Smells great and highly recommended.”

Not only did this help me with my insomnia, but it also help with stress and anxiety.  The only thing is that this strain, for me, goes straight into the next day as far as sleep.  I was still a little sleepy at around 2:30pm the next day.  This strain has a name that really suits i...”

Lol Heavy Duty Fruity is the strongest Hybrid strain I've had. Do yourself a favor and get this strain right away if it's in your area. Definitely worth it!!!”

“I tried this strain last night and I absolutely loved it! Melted away all troubles and pain and left me feeling at ease. The taste was definitely fruity, just all around a great strain. Love love loved it!”
“I Freaking love this strain.”
“This heavy duty fruity will leave you feeling happy and focused. its super sweet and potent.”
“great day flower. the price you can't beat and the flavor is amazing.”

“Heavy Duty Fruity, did not really do it for me. The batch I had barley got me going, but i did feel a strange light body high. I ended up saving it for a night cap, before bed. Never picked it up again. it might be good, the grower who grew it, might have messed it up. Tasted good, but I need some KA-Pow too.”
“Not exactly what I was expecting when I woke up due to no labeling as to an idica. Managed to do laundry but now stuck watching modern marvels.”

“Perfectly Balanced Hybrid! Feels like a heavy indica with no real couch lock or lack of motivation because it also feels like a nice sativa. Best of both worlds. Mellows my anxiety down after a few minutes, works great for stress or irritation and puts me to sleep beautifully. Mine has a musky citrus smell to it. Taste is wonderful. Overall one of my all time favorite strains.”
“Pretty stringy buds with curly fan leaves, not particularly great.”
“This was a wonderfully tasting smoke with a happy and relaxed high. A few hits from the bong and I found my zen. Highly recommend.”
“Very nice, tastes great, takes you up for a nice laughing ride then cruises down the sunset path. It's a must.”
“Plenty of energy, made my lady and I super aroused. Great to get that fire go'n if you know what I mean.  Viagra watch out!!!”
“this bud is a heavy hitter"”"
“Heavy Duty Fruity is a great strain. Smells and tastes delicious. A great high <3”
“I think you already have it a lot jaydi ;) . I love this strain unconditionally.”
“This is some really beautiful bud. Was very happy, giggly and relaxed!”
“Has a great purp skunk smell to it. Tastes good. High is intense and relaxes you. These plants tend to have nice big nugs too. Love this shit. Dueces”

“This flower smelt and taste of a bowl of Fruit Loops cereal. A very strong 
head high stifled all creativity and made me very drowsy. It helped relive lower back pain and increased my appetite. Also a great night time sleep aid.”
“smokes good and the flavor is very fruity”
“rolled a joint.  tasted good.  very short high after 1 shared joint.”

“Wow!
Heavy Duty Fruity is a reasonably priced strain that packs a punch!
I love the aroma of the bud and it gives a wonderful buzz   I felt relaxed and my stress levels were dropped to a halt. 
I recommend this bud!”
“Wasn't too happy with this strain,  it made me fell very tired and sleepy all day.  I wont be trying this one again.”
